revisions.rev:
{{Infobox software | name = QuickView | logo = [[Image:Quikview.png]] | screenshot = [[Image:Quickview windows98.jpg|thumb|center|250px]] | caption = QuickView on Windows 98 | developer = [[Microsoft]] | operating_system = [[Microsoft Windows 95]] to [[Microsoft Windows NT|Microsoft Windows NT 4.0]] | use = [[File viewer]] | license = [[Proprietary software|Proprietary]] | website = (none) }} '''QuickView''' is a [[file viewer]] [[software application|application]] in [[Windows 95]], [[Windows 98]] and [[Windows NT]] [[operating system]]s. With some workarounds the viewer can be used to view practically any file.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.annoyances.org/exec/show/article02-038|title=Use QuickView with any file.|accessdate=2006-06-25}}</ref> However, starting with [[Windows 2000]] and [[Windows Me]], the utility is no longer present in the operating system line,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://support.microsoft.com/?kbid=229889|title= QuickView Command Is Missing from Windows 2000|accessdate= 2006-06-25}}</ref><ref>{{cite news| author= Myles White|url= http://www.computerwriter.com/Star/2000/sept/sf090700%20-%20windows_millennium_edition.htm|title= MS Windows Millennium Edition|publisher=Toronto Star|date=2000-09-07|accessdate=2006-06-25}}</ref> although similarly named commercial alternatives such as ''QuickView Plus''<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.avantstar.com/Products/Quick_View_Plus/QuickViewPlusOverview|title=QuickView Plus website|accessdate= 2006-06-25 | archiveurl = http://web.archive.org/web/20060622060351/http://www.avantstar.com/Products/Quick_View_Plus/QuickViewPlusOverview |archivedate = 2006-06-22}}</ref> (based on Outside In technology) exist for the newer operating systems.
The software has been ported by third parties to support XP, Vista and 7.<ref>{{Cite web| url= http://amirsyahrani.deviantart.com/art/Great-Windows-Explorer-Tools-142913425 |title=Great Windows Explorer Tools | author = Amir Syahrani}}</ref>
== See also == *[[Windows Picture and Fax Viewer]] *[[Comparison of image viewers]]
